MAJOR-GENERAL J. M. SCHOFIELD : 
</p><p>
No movement will be made against <a href='/results.php?tla=jml' rel='colleague adversary met'>Longstreet</a> at present. Give your men and animals all the rest you can preparatory to 
early operations in the spring. Furlough all the veterans you deem it prudent to let go. 
</p><p>
U.S. GRANT, 
</p><p>
Major- General.
